com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables

Class PointCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rajawali3d.ATransformable3D
      • org.rajawali3d.Object3D
        • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables.primitives.Points
          • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables.PointCloud
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<org.rajawali3d.Object3D>, org.rajawali3d.scenegraph.IGraphNodeMember, org.rajawali3d.visitors.INode

    public class PointCloud
extends Points
    Renders a point cloud using colors to indicate distance to the depth sensor. Coloring is based on the light spectrum: closest points are in red, farthest in violet.
